changelog:
- added left hand/right hand deselection tool in sidebar on the right 
 - added new shortcut to bake selected pathbuilder notes (Ctrl + B) 
 - added sustain volume slider (credits to Xion)
 - fixed bug where the right target selection panel wouldn't actually deselct them (credits to Xion) 
 - added mines to error checker (credits to Xion) 
 - added zOffset to modifier preview 
 - fixed bug where melee and pathbuilder note couldn't be placed on the same tick
